channel.title: Only accepts my client
channel.description: How do I make it so my server only accepts connections from my client? I've done it before, it has to do with a client ID or something. I had it working on my old server, but for whatever reason, I can't find the ID number I used in the old client.

item.title: Only accepts my client
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

How do I make it so my server only accepts connections from my client?
I’ve done it before, it has to do with a client ID or something.
I had it working on my old server, but for whatever reason, I can’t find the ID number I used in the old client.

Read full topic
